feat.value: A mud brick that is laid as a foundation by the river
will not last a single day.
But the one that has been baked ensures like a rock.
In the same way, the man who has this mind on worldliness
is not baked in the fear of God.
If he comes upon greatness, he dissolves.
For there are many trials, mostly of this kind, that happen in the midst of men
But it is good that a man know his mesaure,
and to avoid the burden of greatness.
The things which are strenghtened in faith are unshakeable.'
